name: Smith Skyline XL OTG Goggles - Unisex
description: Distortion free viewing and cutting-edge lenses. With a rim-less design, the Skyline offers and expansive field of view and is equipped with 3-layer foam so they feel comfortable from first run to last.Designed for medium to large faces.ChromaPop lenses deliver exceptional clarity, high contrast, and dynamic colour optimization, making them great for challenging light conditions.Spherical Carbonic-X lens has crisp TLT optics for distortion free viewing and a 5X anti-fog inner lens.Thermal lens eliminates fog during rapid elevation changes.Responsive Fit design contours of a variety of face shapes.3-layer DriWix foam provides a comfortable, breathable seal.Wide, silicone backed strap has a quick-fit adjustment system and a clip buckle.Includes a microfiber goggle bag.
